metadata.title: USN-7215-1 -- libxml2 vulnerability
metadata.description: Xisco Fauli discovered that libxml2 incorrectly handled custom SAX handlers. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform XML External Entity (XXE) attacks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7215-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1 libxml2-dev - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1 libxml2-doc - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1 libxml2-utils - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1 python3-libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
